game_description: Create virtual event experiences that feel like you're really there. Maximize attendance with a seamless join event experience easy to use on computer or VR with a click of a link. Engage attendees with freedom to walk around in a 3D convention center and have spontaneous conversations. Fully customize sales leads-generating exhibition booths for sponsors and exhibitors. Give a prestigious stage and fully packed live audience to your presenters and panelists. Customize your branding.
review_1: Significantly more barren then one lead you to believe.
